author: dlouzan
msg: - Added support for viewing remote portlets offered by a producer
- Added support for selecting the remote portlet to deploy when deploying a new portlet
- Created a new RemotePortletTO for getting the remote portlet properties
- Refactored PortletForm into PortletFragmentForm and its child PortletForm
- Modified FormPopulator to use commons-beanutils instead of direct java reflection & introspection
- Added a toHTML method to ConfigPortletException

author: tabish
msg: Changed the get / set ReplyTo methods to handle cms::Destination pointers
